channel.title: How do I make Shops have an unlimited supply? [317]
channel.description: How Do I make shops have an unlimited supply on an item? thanks :o

item.title: How do I make Shops have an unlimited supply? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Swift1 Swift`
item.description:
@Swift1 wrote:

Infinity sign is clientside.

Refactored:

private void drawInterface

if(k10 == 99999) // Makes 99999 coins display as "oo" aTextDrawingArea_1270.method385(0xffff00, "oo", j6 + 9 + j7, k5 + k6);
Non-Refactored:

public final void method105

if(k10 >= 99999) // Makes 99999 coins display as "oo" aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1270.method385(0x00ff80, method43("oo", k10), j6 + 9 + j7, k5 + k6);

You can change the 99999 to any number. Also, I didn’t test the code for non-refactored, so it might not work.

Edit:

The code for non-refactored goes under:

int k10 = class9_1.anIntArray252[i3];

The code for refactored goes under:

int k10 = class9_1.invStackSizes[i3];

Read full topic
